constantValues: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur.
Date and time when the record was created.
Date and time when the record was modified.
Shows who last updated the record.
Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.
Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.
Date and time that the record was migrated.
Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.
The type of owner, either User or Team.
Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record
Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.
Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.
Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Status of the Episode of Care

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Episode of Care
The name of the custom entity.
The practitioner that is the care manager/care coordinator for this patient.
The interval during which the managing organization assumes the defined responsibility.
The EpisodeOfCare may be known by different identifiers for different contexts of use, such as when an external agency is tracking the Episode for funding purposes.
The organization that has assumed the specific responsibilities for the specified duration.
The patient who is the focus of this episode of care.
The interval during which the managing organization assumes the defined responsibility.
